Uses of Interface
btrplace.solver.choco.ChocoReconfigurationAlgorithmParams

  • Packages that use ChocoReconfigurationAlgorithmParams 
    Package Description
    btrplace.solver.choco
    Choco implementation of a ReconfigurationAlgorithm.
    btrplace.solver.choco.runner
    A package dedicated to the different solving methods.
    btrplace.solver.choco.runner.disjoint
    A package dedicated to a solver that splits an instance into disjoint sub-instances then solve them in parallel using a master/worker paradigm.
    btrplace.solver.choco.runner.single
    A solving method that compute a solution for an instance on a single thread.

      interface  ChocoReconfigurationAlgorithm
